service.name: importAddressMatchMapCsv
service.description: Import a CSV (name,value) of AddressMatchMap records

service.name: setPartyStatus
service.description: Set the party status. Requires PARTYMGR_UPDATE or PARTYMGR_STS_UPDATE permission. The change to statusId must be defined in StatusValidChange, otherwise this service will fail. The result is the original statusId, so that ECA conditions can check if a status has actually changed.

service.name: createPartyNote
service.description: Create a note item and associate with a party. If a noteId is passed, creates an assoication to that note instead.

service.name: linkPartyRecord
service.description: Merges customer accounts and disabled the duplicate

service.name: findPartiesById
service.description: Find the partyId corresponding to a reference and a reference type

service.name: createPartyRole
service.description: Create a Party Role (add a Role to a Party). The logged in user must have PARTYMGR_CREATE or have permission to change the role of this partyId

service.name: deletePartyRole
service.description: Delete a Party Role (remove a Role from a Party). The logged in user must have PARTYMGR_DELETE or have permission to change the role of this partyId

service.name: ensurePartyRole
service.description: Ensure that the party is in the specified role.

service.name: ensureNaPartyRole
service.description: Ensure that the party is in the _NA_ role.

service.name: ensurePartyRoleFrom
service.description: Ensure that the party indicate by partyIdFrom is in the roleTypeIdFrom specifc role. If roleTypeIdFrom isn't present use _NA_

service.name: ensurePartyRoleTo
service.description: Ensure that the party indicate by partyIdTo is in the roleTypeIdTo specific role. If roleTypeIdTo isn't present use _NA_

service.name: createPartyRelationship
updatePartyRelationship
deletePartyRelationship
createPartyRelationshipAndRole
service.description: Create party's roles and party's relationship

service.name: createPartyRelationshipType
service.description: Create a new Party Relationship type

service.name: createUpdatePartyRelationshipAndRoles
service.description: Create or update both parties roles and parties relationship, partyRelationshipTypeId being mandatory. The relationship is considered from one side or another (partyId is checked internally against partyIdFrom) If a type of parties relationship exists PartyIdTo or PartyIdFrom are updated. The history is maintained, allowing to track changes.

service.name: createPartyRelationshipContactAccount
service.description: create a company/contact relationship and add the related roles

service.name: findPartyFromEmailAddress
service.description: Find the partyId/contactMechId for a specific email address, if not found do not return a value

service.name: findPartyFromTelephone
service.description: Find the partyId/contactMechId for a specific telephone number, if not found do not return a value

service.name: findPartyFromTelephoneComplete
service.description: Find the partyId/contactMechId for a specific telephone number, if not found do not return a value. Same than above but keep the number complete internally.

service.name: copyPartyContactMechs
service.description: Copies all contact mechs from the partyIdFrom to the partyIdTo. Does not delete or overwrite any contact mechs.

service.name: createPartyFtpAddress
service.description: Create an Ftp Address associated to a party

service.name: updatePartyFtpAddress
service.description: Update an Ftp Address associated to a party

service.name: createContactMechAttribute
service.description: create a contact mech attribute record

service.name: updateContactMechAttribute
service.description: updates a contact mech attribute record

service.name: removeContactMechAttribute
service.description: removes a contact mech attribute record

service.name: deletePartyContactMechPurpose
service.description: Delete a Party Contact Mech Purpose

service.name: expirePartyContactMechPurpose
service.description: Expires a Party Contact Mech Purpose

service.name: createPartyIdentifications
service.description: create many identifications with format in map identifications : [partyType : TYPE, TYPE : value]

service.name: createPartyDataSource
service.description: Creates a relation between a Party and a DataSource using PartyDataSource. The userLogin must have PARTYMGR_SRC_CREATE permission.

service.name: setCommunicationEventRoleStatus
service.description: Set the Communication event Status for a specific role

service.name: createCommunicationEventInterface
service.description: Create a Communication Event with or w/o permission check

service.name: createCommunicationEvent
service.description: Create a Communication Event with permission check

service.name: createCommunicationEventWithoutPermission
service.description: Create a Communication Event without permission check

attribute.name: contactMechPurposeTypeIdFrom
attribute.description: Set a specific purpose for the originator email

service.name: deleteCommunicationEvent
service.description: Delete a Communication Event, optionally delete the attached content and dataresource

service.name: deleteCommunicationEventWorkEffort
service.description: Delete a Communication Event, optionally delete the attached content and dataresource and when this is the only communication event connected to a workeffort delete the workeffort too.

service.name: createCommunicationEventRoleInterface
service.description: Create a Communication Event Role with or w/o permission check

service.name: createCommunicationEventRole
service.description: Create a Communication Event Role with permission check

service.name: createCommunicationEventRoleWithoutPermission
service.description: Create a Communication Event Role without permission check

service.name: createCommEventWorkEffort
service.description: Creates a WorkEffort entity and CommunicationEventWorkEff

service.name: setCommEventRoleToRead
service.description: Marks a communication event as read

service.name: sendCommEventAsEmail
service.description: Sends a communication event as a single-part email using sendMail. All parameters come from CommunicationEvent, which must be of type EMAIL_COMMUNICATION. Will look for a contactMechIdTo to send the emails

service.name: sendCommEventAsFtp
service.description: Sends communication event associated contents to a ftp server. All parameters come from CommunicationEvent, which must be of type FILE_TRANSFER_COMM. Will look for a contactMechIdTo to connect to Ftp

service.name: createCommEventFromFtpTransfer
service.description: Creates a CommunicationEvent record based on information before running a sendContentToFtp service (to be used via ECA)

service.name: createCommEventFromEmail
service.description: Creates a CommunicationEvent record based on information before running a sendMail service (to be used via ECA)

service.name: updateCommEventAfterEmail
service.description: Updates a CommunicationEvent record after running a sendMail service (to be used via ECA)

service.name: storeIncomingEmail
service.description: Process incoming email. Try to determine partyIdFrom from the first SendFrom email address. datetimeStarted and datetimeEnded are the sent and received dates respectively, partyIdTo is from the first SendTo email address or the delivered-to address. If the parties are not found, the email addresses are stored in CommunicationEvent.note If however it is detected as spam (external) or when the 'from' email address is missing, the service will not return a communicationEventId. If the party cannot be found the status of the communicationEvent will be set to: COM_UNKNOWN_PARTY. If the parties are found the status is set to COM_ENTERED

service.name: sendEmailToContactList
service.description: Send emails to members of a contact list, wrapping each email in its own transaction and tagging each member that has been sent, so if the whole effort is aborted, it can start over from the middle. The max-retry is important because if this service is and some emails cannot sent, it will start again later and try again

service.name: setCommEventComplete
service.description: Sets the status of a communication event to COM_COMPLETE using the updateCommunicationEvent service, set datetimeEnded to now if not defined

service.name: sendEmailDated
service.description: Checks for email communication events with the status COM_IN_PROGRESS and a startdate which is expired, then send the email

service.name: createPartyTextContent
service.description: Creates a Text Document DataResource and Content Records

service.name: uploadPartyContentFile
service.description: Upload and attach a file to a party

service.name: getPartyEmail
service.description: Get the main party Email address

service.name: partyBasePermissionCheck
service.description: Performs a basic Party Manager security check. The user must have one of the base PARTYMGR CRUD+ADMIN permissions.

service.name: partyIdPermissionCheck
service.description: Performs a party ID security check. The userLogin partyId must equal the partyId parameter, or the logged-in user must have the correct permission to perform the operation.

service.name: partyStatusPermissionCheck
service.description: Performs a party status security check. The userLogin partyId must equal the partyId parameter OR the user must have one of the base PARTYMGR or PARTYMGR_STS CRUD+ADMIN permissions.

service.name: partyGroupPermissionCheck
service.description: Performs a party group security check. The userLogin partyId must equal the partyId parameter OR the user has one of the base PARTYMGR or PARTYMGR_GRP CRUD+ADMIN permissions.

service.name: partyDatasourcePermissionCheck
service.description: Performs a party datasource security check. The user must have one of the base PARTYMGR or PARTYMGR_SRC CRUD+ADMIN permissions.

service.name: partyRolePermissionCheck
service.description: Performs a party role security check. The user must have one of the base PARTYMGR or PARTYMGR_ROLE CRUD+ADMIN permissions.

service.name: partyRelationshipPermissionCheck
service.description: Performs a party relationship security check. The user must have one of the base PARTYMGR or PARTYMGR_REL CRUD+ADMIN permissions.

service.name: partyContactMechPermissionCheck
service.description: Performs a party contact mech security check. The userLogin partyId must equal the partyId parameter OR the user must have one of the base PARTYMGR or PARTYMGR_PCM CRUD+ADMIN permissions.

service.name: accAndDecPartyInvitationPermissionCheck
service.description: Performs accept and decline PartyInvitation security check. The userLogin partyId must equal the partyIdTo in PartyInvitation OR partyId fetched using emailAdress in PartyInvitation. The user with PARTYMGR_UPDATE permission can also perform this function.

service.name: cancelPartyInvitationPermissionCheck
service.description: Performs cancel PartyInvitation security check. The userLogin partyId must equal the partyId/partyIdFrom in PartyInvitation OR partyId fetched using emailAdress in PartyInvitation. The user with PARTYMGR_UPDATE permission can also perform this function.

service.name: createPostalAddressAndPurposes
service.description: Create postal address, purposes and set them defaults

service.name: updatePostalAddressAndPurposes
service.description: Update postal address, purposes and set them defaults. The setShippingPurpose and setBillingPurpose enable the service to create purposes for PostalAddress and make them default addresses of party

service.name: updateContactMechAndPurposes
service.description: Update postal address, telecom number and purposes. The setShippingPurpose and setBillingPurpose enable the service to create purposes for TelecomNumber

service.name: createUpdatePartyPostalAddress
service.description: Create or Update a postal address

service.name: quickCreateCustomer
service.description: Create customer profile on basis of First Name ,Last Name and Email Address

service.name: getPartyMainRole
service.description: Get the main role of this party which is a child of the MAIN_ROLE roletypeId

service.name: sendContactUsEmailToCompany
service.description: Create communication event and send mail to company

service.name: importParty
service.description: Import an party with related main role, company and contact info in csv format, will ignore parties already entered
